title: Juicy Roots
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Opened Feb 2014, this downtown eatery provides vegetarian, vegan, and raw food made using wholefood ingredients. Offers a list of signature juices and smoothies, or customize your own juice or smoothie as well wrap and salad. Has soups, selection of raw treats, and a salad bar. Gluten-free options.
